title: Phone app on my pixel 3 randomly started crashing today. Opens for less than a second and closes!?
content: I've reset phone after all attempts, I've cleared the cache for media and the app, I've gone off WiFi, I've delete latest videos from browser app to see if they were the glitch... Nothing working at all. Opens for <1 second or if longer, immediately closes if I choose any picture or video. Doesn't stay open long enough to modify upload settings either...
